chapter.title: Activiti Cycle
chapter.para: Activiti Cycle is a web application that aims to provide a collaborative platform for business stakeholders, developers and IT operations people. It combines different artifacts in one view, which makes it easy to browse different modeling repositories, file systems or source code repositories. In addition, it provides the means to move artifacts between repositories and even transform them into different formats. section.title: Repositories
section.para: The above image shows the Activiti Cycle repository tree. By default it provides access to the repository of the Activiti Modeler and a demo Eclipse workspace which is located at ${activiti.home}/apps/eclipse-workspace in your local file system. The repositories are plugged in as repository connectors which are currently configured via an xml file which is placed in the bin directory of the tomcat installation.
